highlights: Facilitated integrations with Equifax and Onfido REST APIs for credit and personal details checks, resulting in a 13% increase in cash collection and a reduction in bad debt customers.
Implemented retry mechanisms to ensure reliable API interactions and developed cost-saving logic to optimize API usage, minimizing operational expenses.
Designed a scalable data model for defining and configuring underwriting rules against insurance packages to enable business growth into Arizona and other US states.

Built a standalone backend module in TypeScript/Node.js for evaluating customer insurance applications against predefined underwriting rules, adhering to SOLID and DRY principles to ensure maintainability and scalability.

Implemented public-facing APIs in GraphQL to expose insurance applications and underwriting decisions to customer support, and customer alike. Using React, Extended our internal CRM to display the data in a user-friendly way.

Strategically facilitated the transformation and migration of existing insurance data to support the launch of a new insurance products, working closely with the data team to ensure data integrity and consistency.
Participated in code reviews, providing feedback based on clean code, DDD, TDD and other engineering best practices.

Reduced production bugs and increased test coverage by writing automated tests. Utilised BDD style for defining/writing test scenarios for high level end-to-end tests to better align with the business and support communication.
Authored system design documentation, providing visual representations of systems, processes and architectural decisions through BPMN and C4 diagrams.
Conducted event storming workshops with product managers, customer support, and other stakeholders to clearly define and align on product requirements and expectations.
Facilitated backend guild meetings, organised discussion topics to promote best practices and knowledge sharing among team members.

Provided on-call engineering support, working closely with the customer support team to diagnose user experience pain points and apply Agile methodologies and iterative feedback for effective issue resolution.

projects.name: Framble
keywords: AWS Services - Lambda, DynamoDB, EventBridge, SQS, Cognito
